targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "user", mean("usage_idle") AS "idle", mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_nice") AS "system", mean("usage_guest") AS "guest", mean("usage_irq") AS "irq", mean("usage_iowait") AS "io_wait" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hosts$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: environment
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "environment"

list.name: hosts
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"  WHERE "environment"='$environment'
